p: Territory of Washington County of Walla Walla }

H.J. Mann being first duly sworn depose and says that Bessie Mann is illegally and improperly held in custody and possession of and by Cynthia Mann in the County of Walla Walla in the Territory of Washington and
on account of the facts set forth in the petition hereto annexed believe that said Cynthia Mann will carry said Bessie Mann out of the Territory of Washington before compliance with a writ of Habeas Corpus could be enforced
Wherefore affiant asks that a warrant issue as provided by law to bring said Bessie Mann before the Judge before whom the application is made to be dealt with according to law
Subscribed and sworn to before me this 24th day of April 1888
